definition:
A collection $\mathcal M$ of subsets of $\Omega$ is a *monotone class*
if it is closed under increasing and decreasing sequences of sets, i.e.

1.  $A_1 \subseteq A_2 \subseteq A_3 ,...\in \mathcal M \Rightarrow
    \bigcup A_n \in \mathcal M$

2.  $A_1 \supseteq A_2 \supseteq A_3 ,...\in \mathcal M \Rightarrow
    \bigcap A_n \in \mathcal M$
